item.title: Communications Systems (HF) – HF Radios Required (SATCOM NOT INSTALLED)

remarks.para: Two HF radios are required for dispatch in MNPS, NOPAC CEPAC, and any operations outside VHF communication range of ATC and company. Flight Control may provide alternative routes within these areas with less than two HF radios provided adequate VHF coverage is available for ATC and/or company.
